      org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getLang()
      Return the loaded language configuration.
      private org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration loadDefaults()
      Load the default English messages from the eng.yml file included in the HiddenSwitch jar file.
      void reloadLang()
      Attempts to load the language file from the disc, if not found it will load from the default eng.yml file included in the HiddenSwitch jar file.
      boolean saveToFile()
      Save the language configuration stored in the current instance to file.

        public org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getLang()
        Return the loaded language configuration.
        Returns:

      • loadDefaults

        private org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration loadDefaults()
        Load the default English messages from the eng.yml file included in the HiddenSwitch jar file.
        Returns:
        YamlConfiguration - the default language configuration.

      • reloadLang

        public void reloadLang()
        Attempts to load the language file from the disc, if not found it will load from the default eng.yml file included in the HiddenSwitch jar file.

      • saveToFile

        public boolean saveToFile()
        Save the language configuration stored in the current instance to file.
        Returns:
        boolean - Returns True if successful, otherwise false

      • saveToFile

        public boolean saveToFile(org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration conf)
        Save the provided YamlConfiguration to file.
        Parameters:
        conf - The config to save.
        Returns:
        boolean - True if successful, otherwise false;
